message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $12000 to me. Considering its immense worth to both us and potential buyers, I am offering it to you for $11000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure the product at a significant discount while ensuring you receive a high-quality item. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.
